step.code: # Read the base model file to understand required patterns <read_file> <path>src/models/base.py</path> </read_file>

<write_to_file> <path>src/models/research_topic.py</path> <content><![CDATA[ from datetime import datetime from typing import Any, Dict, List, Optional from uuid import UUID, uuid4
from pydantic import BaseModel, Field
from src.models.base import BrainForgeBaseModel, TimestampMixin, ProvenanceMixin
class ResearchTopicCreate(BrainForgeBaseModel): """Creation model for ResearchTopic."""
title: str = Field(..., min_length=1, max_length=255, description="Research topic title") description: Optional[str] = Field(None, max_length=1000, description="Topic description") tags: List[str] = Field(default_factory=list, description="Topic tags") metadata: Dict[str, Any] = Field(default_factory=dict, description="Additional metadata")
class ResearchTopicUpdate(BrainForgeBaseModel): """Update model for ResearchTopic."""
title: Optional[str] = Field(None, min_length=1, max_length=255) description: Optional[str] = Field(None, max_length=1000) tags: Optional[List[str]] = Field(None)
class ResearchTopic(BrainForgeBaseModel, TimestampMixin, ProvenanceMixin): """Research topic model with constitutional compliance."""
id: UUID = Field(default_factory=uuid4) title: str description: Optional[str] = None tags: List[str] = Field(default_factory=list) metadata: Dict[str, Any] = Field(default_factory=dict) constitutional_audit: Dict[str, Any] = Field(default_factory=dict)
class Config: from_attributes = True ]
